title: How to screen record on your OnePlus phone
content:
OxygenOS 12 – OnePlus’s version of Android 12 – has added some fantastic features and quality-of-life shortcuts to OnePlus devices. One of those is the addition of the screen recording shortcut in the Quick Settings menu. Here’s how to use it.

more…

The post How to screen record on your OnePlus phone appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Initiating a screen record on your OnePlus phone is super easy to do. This guide will take you through getting started and making it easy.
